thread.title: IDE offers advanced power mgmt, easy setup
thread.title_full: IDE offers advanced power mgmt, easy setup

title: IDE offers advanced power mgmt, easy setup
text:
09/28/2015 IDE offers advanced power mgmt, easy setup 
The latest version of the Studio 7 integrated development environment (IDE) for Atmel MCUs includes an advanced power optimization feature and a new START function. START is an intuitive graphical platform for quick setup of appropriate drivers and middleware, and complete example applications. 
The Data Visualizer plug-in now captures and displays run-time power data from an application, when used with the Power Debugger function or a supported Xplained-PRO board. It makes it possible precise correlation of power changes with code execution. Studio 7 also allows one-click import of projects created in the Arduino development environment â€“ with more than 1600 ready-to-use project examples. Free of charge.
